dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing about 800K synthetic images for text localization in natural images, primarily used for pre-training scene text detectors.
dcterms:title: SynthText

dcterms:description: A comprehensive dataset for scene text detection and recognition, focusing on curved text with polygon-shaped bounding boxes.
dcterms:title: Total-Text

Jin Lianwen

dcterms:description: A dataset designed for detecting curved text in the wild, containing images with text instances labeled with polygons annotated by 14 vertices.
dcterms:title: CTW1500

dcterms:description: A dataset for the ICDAR 2015 competition on robust reading, consisting of images with word-level annotations and rectangular bounding boxes.
dcterms:title: ICDAR2015

dcterms:description: A multi-lingual dataset for scene text detection and script identification, containing images annotated in nine different languages.
dcterms:title: ICDAR2017

dcterms:description: A dataset for detecting texts of arbitrary orientations in natural images, containing images with line-level annotations.

dcterms:description: A large and diverse OCR dataset consisting of images with high density of annotated words, aimed at large-scale end-to-end reasoning for arbitrary-shaped scene text.
dcterms:title: TextOCR
